summary.span: 用下划线来指定用作访问键的字符。

span.span: Specifies with an underscore the character that is used as the access key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果内容中有多个下划线字符，只有第一个转换为; 其他下划线显示为普通文本。If your content has multiple underscore characters, only the first one is converted into an ; the other underscores appear as normal text. 如果要转换的访问密钥为下划线字符不是第一个下划线，使用两个连续的下划线前加上你想要转换的任何下划线。If the underscore that you want converted to the access key is not the first underscore, use two consecutive underscores for any underscores that precede the one that you want to convert. 例如，下面的代码包含一个访问密钥，并显示**W**orld:For example, the following code contains an access key and displays as _Hello**W**orld: ``` __Hello_World ``` 由于之前 H 下划线是一个双精度值，W 键注册为访问键。Because the underscore that precedes H is a double, the W key registers as the access key. 若要使用用作内容宿主控件样式中，设置中，如本示例所示：To use as a content host in a control style, set in the , as this example shows: ``` ``` ## Examples 可以使用标记以创建; 但是，标记不需要。You can use the tag to create an ; however, a tag is not necessary. 下面的示例演示如何创建访问密钥，无需标记。The following example shows how to create an access key with and without the tag. [!code-xaml[AccessText#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/AccessText/CS/pane1.xaml#2)]

summary.span: 获取或设置每个行框的高度。

span.span: Gets or sets the height of each line box.

value.span: 一个指定每个行框的高度的双精度值。

span.span: A double that specifies the height of each line box.

value.span: 此值必须等于或大于0.0034且等于或小于160000。

span.span: This value must be equal to or greater than 0.0034 and equal to or less then 160000.

value.span: 值为(等效于特性值的自动) 使行高度由当前字体特征自动确定。

span.span: A value of (equivalent to an attribute value of Auto) causes the line height to be determined automatically from the current font characteristics.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 更改此值不会更改关联的文本; 的高度相反，它会更改包含它的框。Changing this value does not change the height of the associated text; instead, it changes the box that contains it. 若要更改文本的大小，请使用属性。To change the size of the text, use the property. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|, , , , | ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性控制保留的文本与行框。 properties control the line box that is reserved for text. 允许用户设置的建议高度。 allows users to set a suggestion of height. 定义如何强制执行。 defines how the is enforced. 可以设置属性设置为或。You can set the property to or . - 值增加到最高的对象在行中的行。The value increases the line to the tallest object in the line. 它可确保没有任何项拉伸过度或进行修整。It ensures that no item overdraws or is trimmed. - 值强制实施上的所有行的值。The value enforces a value on all lines. 如果属性不提供足够的空间、 拉伸过度或修整文本。If the property does not provide sufficient space, the text is either overdrawn or trimmed. 出现这种情况取决于值。Which occurs depends on the value. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|, , , , |

member this.Text : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置 元素所显示的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text that is displayed by the element.

value.span: 不带第一个下划线字符的文本。

span.span: The text without the first underscore character.

value.span: 默认值为一个空字符串。

span.span: The default is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果使用，不会创建一个访问密钥属性提供的文本元素。An access key is not created if you use the property to supply text for an element. 此属性在内部用于确定访问密钥显示的文本。This property is used internally to determine the text that is displayed by the access key. 若要设置不包含助记键 （带下划线的字符） 的附加文本或检索访问密钥文本，可以使用此属性。You can use this property to set additional text that does not contain the mnemonic (underlined character) or to retrieve the access key text. ## XAML 对象元素用法XAML Object Element Usage ``` - or - ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *_accessText**_accessText* 包含下划线字符的字符串。A string that contains the underscore character. 此值将成为句柄访问密钥*对象*。This value becomes an that handles access keys for the *object*. 访问密钥是紧跟在下划线的字符。The access key is the character that immediately follows the underscore. *accessTextObject**accessTextObject* 。The . ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|, , | ## Examples 下面的示例创建自定义的访问密钥，其中包含助记键，并使用，然后设置文本的其余部分的第一个字母的访问密钥属性。The following example creates an access key that customizes the first letter of the access key, which contains the mnemonic, and then sets the rest of the text by using the property. [!code-xaml[AccessTextProps_snip#AccessTextText](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/AccessTextProps_snip/CS/pane1.xaml#accesstexttext)]

summary.span: 获取或设置添加到 元素的文本的修饰。

span.span: Gets or sets the decorations that are added to the text of an element.
The applied to the text of an .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关文本修饰的详细信息，请参阅。For more information about text decorations, see . 通常不设置此属性，通过使用标记或代码。This property is not typically set, either by using markup or code. 此属性可能的样式设置，或以编程方式更改公开的访问密钥 （与文本的文本颜色相同下划线） 的默认修饰。This property exposes the default decoration for an access key (an underline in the same text color as the text) for possible styling or programmatic change. 由于用户希望访问的密钥标识符具有某些外观[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]，更好的选择是要通过应用程序范围的机制，例如应用程序样式或自定义主题更改此属性。Because users expect access key identifiers to have a certain appearance in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)], a better choice is to change this property by using application-wide mechanisms, such as application styles or custom themes. ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *OneOrMoreTextDecorations**OneOrMoreTextDecorations* 一个或多个元素。One or more elements. 如果您要定义自定义文本修饰的文本，请使用此语法。Use this syntax if you are defining custom text decorations. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 创建文本修饰](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-create-a-text-decoration.md)。For details, see [How to: Create a Text Decoration](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-create-a-text-decoration.md). ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`||

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常不设置此属性，通过使用标记或代码。This property is not typically set, either by using markup or code. 此属性公开的默认效果以可能的样式设置，或以编程方式更改的访问密钥。This property exposes the default effects for an access key for possible styling or programmatic change. 由于用户希望访问的密钥标识符具有某些外观[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]，更好的选择是要通过应用程序范围的机制，例如应用程序样式或自定义主题更改此属性。Because users expect access key identifiers to have a certain appearance in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)], a better choice is to change this property by using application-wide mechanisms, such as application styles or custom themes. ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *OneOrMoreTextEffects**OneOrMoreTextEffects* 一个或多个元素。One or more elements. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`||
